name: josi-admin
description: All of the tools necessary for administering hubot via the adapter interface (HipChat, IRC…) are managed in this package.
readme:
### josi-admin

[coming soon]

	npm install josi-admin

All of the tools necessary for administering JoSi via the adapter interface (HipChat, IRC…) are managed in this package.

	- josi-admin/
		- node_modules/
			- josi-cron/
		- src/		
			- help.coffee
			- update.coffee
